      • getPhoneNumber

        @NotNull
public static java.lang.String getPhoneNumber(@NotNull
                                                        android.content.Context $this$getPhoneNumber)

        获取手机号码

        返回:

        手机号码，手机号码不一定能获取到

        需添加权限 android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE or android.permission.READ_SMS or android.permission.READ_PHONE_NUMBERS

        DeviceId(IMEI) = 99000311726612 DeviceSoftwareVersion = 00 Line1Number = NetworkCountryIso = cn NetworkOperator = 46003 NetworkOperatorName = 中国电信 NetworkType = 6 honeType = 2 SimCountryIso = cn SimOperator = 46003 SimOperatorName = 中国电信 SimSerialNumber = 89860315045710604022 SimState = 5 SubscriberId(IMSI) = 460030419724900 VoiceMailNumber = *86
